attributes.action: Reduce lorry driving hours to 3x12 hours days and 2x10 hours days.
attributes.background:
Currently lorry drivers can work 3x15 hour days and 2x13 hour days in a week, this is a total of 71 hours a week. 
I think this is far to many hours for anyone in the driving industry to be On the road.

rejection.details:
These rules are set by the EU. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/drivers-hours/eu-rules

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to work with other EU member states to change this, and/or to change UK law after the UK leaves the EU.
